Articles.Content:
So I've got a mun base experiencing a minor bug and a MAJOR MAJOR KRAKEN bug. (Excuse the caps, but it is endangering the lives of the crew). I was wondering if anyone has experienced these and/or figured out a fix.

 

First Bug (minor):

Gigantor solar panels can be seen through other parts in VAB. It's just a little graphics glitch, but I hope it's fixed. The panels can be seen through the white radiator on the right.

 

Second Bug (kraken):

Something on the mun base is causing it to shake violently (I have to time warp to prevent shaking). It originates from the science module (with the lab) and maybe the docking port that connects it to the cupola component. It appears that this bug has already been reported and priority set to high as "Strange Destructive Oscillations" which is exactly what is happening here.

Edited April 22, 2016 by SelectHalfling0
